description: Only run rows with wetland code. All wetland rows have the first character in the 4 letter code so test for it.
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Make sure the 4 letter wetland code has a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the first character.
Make sure the 4 letter wetland code has a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the second character.
Make sure the 4 letter wetland code has a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the third character.
Make sure the 4 letter wetland code has a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the fourth character.
